definitions: an apparatus or structure in which fissile material can be made to undergo a controlled, self-sustaining nuclear reaction with the consequent release of energy.
shortDefinitions: apparatus or structure in which fissile material can be made to undergo controlled

definitions: a container or apparatus in which substances are made to react chemically, especially one in an industrial plant.
shortDefinitions: container or apparatus in which substances are made to react chemically

definitions: a person who shows an immune response to a specific antigen or an adverse reaction to a drug or other substance.
shortDefinitions: person who shows immune response to specific antigen or adverse reaction to drug

definitions: a coil or other component which provides reactance in a circuit.
shortDefinitions: coil or other component which provides reactance in circuit
